description: Conversation where the user asks LexTimeKeeper for a fiscal‑year report of total billed hours per matter grouped by client, and the assistant uses the generate_summary_report tool to produce a markdown summary.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Your job is to help law firms extract activities from logs, map them to billing codes, create time‑sheet entries, and generate reporting summaries using the provided tools.
We need a report showing total hours billed per matter for the last fiscal year, grouped by client.

Got it. I’ll compile a summary for the most recent fiscal year. Assuming your firm’s fiscal year runs from October 1 to September 30, I’ll pull all time entries from 2023‑10‑01 through 2024‑09‑30 and aggregate the hours by client and matter.

Generating the report now…
